thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 14 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Mimecast Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.14

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Mimecast Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.14
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Mimecast Ltd:
* MIMECAST ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.05
* Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.14 * Q4 REVENUE $73.4 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $71.6 MILLION
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.01 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FOR Q1 OF 2019, CONSTANT CURRENCY REVENUE GROWTH IS EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF 26% TO 28%
* SEES Q1 OF 2019 REVENUE TO BE IN RANGE OF $76.3 MILLION TO $77.1 MILLION
* FOR FULL YEAR 2019, REVENUE IS EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $327.0 MILLION TO $338.0 MILLION
* Q1 REVENUE VIEW $74.0 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY REVENUE VIEW $320.4 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
